data.name: Immigration Application Automation - Fragomen
data.description: Comprehensive automation of visa filing processes for one of the largest immigration services organizations, eliminating manual data entry and reducing processing errors through intelligent bot integration with government systems.
data.clientDescription: One of the largest immigration services organizations globally

challenge.summary: Manual visa filing process with high error rates and processing delays
details: Users manually taking data from in-house application and entering it on Government Immigration Application website
Human errors due to fatigue from repetitive tasks
Inconsistent data formats from different staff members

solution.summary: Automated unattended bot system for visa application processing with intelligent data transformation and queue management
approach: Unattended bot processes data from in-house application
Automatic data format translation for government portal
Automated robot triggering through periodic report generation
PHP web application for standardized input processing

results.summary: Eliminated manual errors and significantly improved processing efficiency

metrics.description: Elimination of manual data entry errors
Reduction in visa application processing time
Fully automated data extraction and portal submission

benefits: Elimination of human errors due to fatigue
Automated robot triggering without manual intervention
Ability to retry failed cases after data correction
Standardized data input through PHP application

phases: Discovery workshop to understand current processes
Bot development using selected RPA tool
Integration with government portal and in-house systems
PHP web application development for standardized inputs
implementation.methodology: Agile methodology with daily scrums and weekly demos
